participant_1.background:
I start my day by feeding my dog, who is always excited to see me.
i have 2 brothers.
I spend my days doing schoolwork and physical therapy while healing from my broken leg.
My medication makes me sleepy sometimes, so I once pretended to be asleep in my car in order to get out of a speeding ticket.
I have been grieving the loss of my husband.

participant_2.background:
I'm not married, I enjoy my freedom and the thrill of competition.
I love Disney movies, so I would have a crib mobile with Disney characters on it in my baby's nursery.
i have an older brother who plays football in the nfl.
My family is close-knit and we enjoy spending time together, especially on sunny days.
I enjoy spending time with my kids because it reminds me of a simpler time when I was younger.

content.text: Hello, how is your day going?
Hey there! My day is going well. How about yours?
My day is going well, thank you. I am just getting over a broken leg, but I am feeling better.
Oh no! I hope you are healing quickly. I know how that feels. I broke my leg when I was 10 years old.
Thank you. It is healing slowly, but I am getting there.
That is good to hear. I am sure you will be back to 100% in no time.
I hope so! I have a dog, and I miss being able to play with him.
Aww, I bet he misses you too! I have a dog as well. His name is Max.
Oh, what kind of dog is he?
He is a golden retriever. He is the sweetest dog ever.
Golden retrievers are so cute! I love their fur.
Me too! They are the best dogs.
I think I am ready to get back to work. I am tired of being stuck at home.
I know what you mean. I am ready to get back to work too.
I am going to go do some schoolwork and physical therapy. I will talk to you later!
Have a good day! I will talk to you later too!
